thoughts.text: I think it would be useful to get hyperlinks from a website.
thoughts.reasoning: Getting hyperlinks from a website can help me extract useful information or data from the website and use it in other operations or tasks.
thoughts.plan: - Use the 'get_hyperlinks' command to get the hyperlinks from the specified website.
thoughts.criticism: I should make sure to specify the correct website URL to avoid getting hyperlinks from the wrong website or encountering errors.
